review_data.title: Hürlimann
review_data.content: Schöne Bäckerei mit grosser Auswahl an Brot, Gebäcken und Salaten. Persönlicher Service wo Stammkunden mit Namen begrüsst werden. Mein Favorit...More

review_data.title: Walk-in, take away counter service
review_data.content: Hurlimann is located at Hottingerplatz and direct access with Tram #3. This small counter service only bakery is packed full of delicacies from fresh breads, pastries, sandwiches, salads and healthy breakfast options. It is also like a kiosk style set-up as it offers a lot...More
